title: I have composed a 6 track album of original orchestral compositions inspired by the LoL lore

embed.description: A compilation of all my LoL inspired themes to date.

body:
Hey guys,

I'm Krale, an aspiring composer and sound designer from Canada.

This album features custom themes for:
Demacia
Shurima
Bilgewater
Creator Viktor
Ionia
Freljord

I hope you guys enjoy this! It was loads of fun to write.

Wasn't sure if this belonged in community creations or sound and music so I posted in both...

replies.body: AHHHH! Thanks for sharing these!!! The Demacia track got me right in the feeeeelz!!!
Glad you enjoyed it :D
Is it just white noise? Like the lore?
This is crazy awesome dude! Awesome work!
Thanks for the kind words. Means a lot!
Dude these are sex. What program do you use to create your masterpieces?
I used FL Studio with various playable instrument libraries
Funny thing, I actually already had the "Empire of the Sands" in a youtube playlist I made. It was posted by the channel Epic World Music
Haha it was indeed featured by them!
Totally downloading these! Nice work! :D
Thank you! Glad you liked them!

This really deserves more views.

Excellent job, especially on the Bilgewater track!
I'm at work, is this available on Google Play?
No, unfortunately... It's available as a free download on Soundcloud. Not sure if you can give things out for free on Google Play.
Amazing!!
sounds like youre using EWQL. samples sound fantastic bro. ive actually been working on a few tracks of my own and ill post them when i do. but keep up the good work man.
Actually I didn't use EWQL. I mostly used other Kontakt libraries. I have yet to try EWQL but I definitely want to get my hands on them!

they are worth it. I havent been to their website but i heard they moved to a subscription service kind of like Microsoft Office 365. so It's probably a lot more affordable.

Ive been doing a few Champion focused themes myself and I actually listen to your tracks to inspire me for regional influence on champ theme. You did a good job here.
Commenting so I can find this later.
This is amazing thank you for doing this for us :3
I followed you on SoundCloud! Also, I couldn't find a spot to let me make comments on the tracks. Was this intentional?
island of Enlightenment sounds like Kung Fu Panda.  WHICH IS AWESOME!
This is fantastic. Particularly fond of Kingdom's Pride. It gives me chills. Love it. Your work is amazing. Don't give up, this seems like something you're meant to do!
Fantastic work! What did you use to make them?
Wow, this is absolutely stunning. I could really see you going far; keep it up!
When I read that it was based on the lore, I completely expected a blank video.
So you're gonna delete it, than flop around getting to new stuff for a couple years? In all seriousness though, nice listening.
